name: Casket Rider
description:
After A distress call is received from a nearby mining colony, you are sent out to investigate in you  AT235 "Casket" Mechanical Utility Robot.

Controls:

WASD moves the mech

Mouse moves your view in the cockpit

Mouse left click to press the buttons in your cockpit

Escape to quit

Third Party Assets:

Synty Studios(3d Building Assets)

PROTOFACTOR, INC (Character assets and animations)

wwwtyro.net (Skybox)
